name: RACV Healesville Country Club

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for a relaxing weekend and had a great time. The facilities are superb. The hotel is in a rural setting but just 20minutes walk (or 5 minutes drive) from the centre of Healesville. The dining was very good and not bad value for a 5* hotel.
reviews.title: Great hotel in country setting

aka: RACV Healesville Country Club Yarra Valley
